fehd.ADR_TC: 香港銅鑼灣告士打道280號世界貿易中心10樓1002鋪

result.adr_address: Shop 1002, Shop 1002, World Trade Centre, Gloucester Rd, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Shop 1002, Shop 1002, World Trade Centre, Gloucester Rd, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Ruby Tuesday - Causeway Bay

reviews.text:
Food is perfectly nice, slow cooked steak is excellent.  Spare ribs, potato skin, nachos,  chicken wings, brownies sundae and cheesecake are as delicious as usual.  
However, service can be improved, we have waited 20 minutes for the drinks, food was served much more efficiently.  Waiter said there is only one person  working in the bar, in this case, please, add man power in that section then.
Anyway, I love all food in Ruby Tuesday, yummy. 😍
We got a membership so it became a real deal to dine at Ruby Tuesday. The chocolate tall cake never fails! Best in town, probably.

I got the membership at Ruby Tuesday and it was absolutely worth it. The food is amazing, the staffs are very friendly and the drinks are brilliant!
Highly recommend getting the membership.. the costs come down straight by 50% and you can guarantee yourself multiple visits because the experience is a combo on its own.
Very delicious, yummy steaks. Pasta is good. Pleasant accomodation, clean and nice staffs.

Staff are very friendly and the ambience was nice. I ordered ribs and my gf ordered steak. She loved the steak and my ribs were delicious as well. Only downside is the the veggies were not well cooked e.g the cauliflower were still hard. Aside from that we were happy.

result.adr_address: Shop 1002, Shop 1002, World Trade Centre, Gloucester Rd, Causeway Bay, 香港
result.formatted_address: Shop 1002, Shop 1002, World Trade Centre, Gloucester Rd, Causeway Bay, 香港
result.name: Ruby Tuesday

reviews.text:
半價都抵嘅～
****************************

🤭我個好閨密join左Ruby既member，好抵呀，所以我地諗住密密用，因為有成半價~🤩Waitress循例行過黎自我介紹（通常佢噏咁快我都唔記得佢叫咩名，咁黑又更加難認樣）。

🔆Loaded Nachos 粟米片 （粟米片，配上辣椒醬，Cheese，墨西哥胡椒，番茄碎，酸忌廉牛油果醬和莎莎醬) - 唔辣，好豐富口感，食到酸酸地既蕃茄同酸忌廉味，仲有芝士味，唔錯！

🔆chicken & mushroom alfredo（雞肉，蘑菇芝士白汁意大利細麵）- 得兩細舊雞肉，無咩雞味，不過調味同芝士白汁幾好，意大利麵熟度剛好，不過不失。

🔆Mini Trio （三個 mini burger：車打芝士burger、蟹肉burger、烤豬burger）- 個包太乾，唔知係咪醬汁太少，同d肉烤太耐，整體好乾，但味道唔錯。

🔆Strawberries & Ice Cream （士多啤梨醬，士多啤梨，雲呢拿雪糕，牛油蘇餅底）- 每樣都好，就係個餅底一d都唔夠蘇。

🔆New York Cheesecake-好正宗口感同味道，仲好大舊，夠硬淨。

太耐冇嚟 突然有半價優惠 正正正
不過豬肋骨相比以往略為遜色
坐位舒服,三五知己黎傾計最佳選擇的地方，因我係Elite會員，茶餐買一送一，超抵
客不太多，食物不平宜，但也不太貴，傾談合宜之地

Food is perfectly nice, slow cooked steak is excellent.  Spare ribs, potato skin, nachos,  chicken wings, brownies sundae and cheesecake are as delicious as usual.  
However, service can be improved, we have waited 20 minutes for the drinks, food was served much more efficiently.  Waiter said there is only one person  working in the bar, in this case, please, add man power in that section then.
Anyway, I love all food in Ruby Tuesday, yummy. 😍

result.vicinity: Shop 1002, World Trade Centre, Shop 1002, Gloucester Road, Causeway Bay
